mapper.sql: GRP_MENU_HST_CD /*그룹메뉴이력코드 */ , GRP_CD /*그룹코드 */ , MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CRM_GRP_MENU_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_GRP_BAS B ON A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD INNER JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS C ON A.MENU_CD = C.MENU_CD

SELECT A.GRP_MENU_HST_CD /*그룹메뉴이력코드 */ , A.GRP_CD /*그룹코드 */ , A.MENU_CD /*메뉴코드 */ , A.DEL_YN /*삭제여부 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.GRP_NM , C.MENU_NM , ( SELECT LISTAGG(MENU_NM, '>') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY MENU_LVL_NO) FROM CRM_MENU_BAS WHERE 1=1 START WITH MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD CONNECT BY PRIOR PRNTS_MENU_CD = MENU_CD ) MENU_PATH FROM CRM_GRP_MENU_HST A INNER JOIN CRM_GRP_BAS B ON A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD INNER JOIN CRM_MENU_BAS C ON A.MENU_CD = C.MENU_CD
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
